@type.title: @Type
@type.description: TODO

name.title: Name
name.description: The name or title of the record.

description.title: Description
description.description: The description or abstract of the record.

url.title: Url
url.description: The url of the record.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: Any kind of identifier for the record.

@id.title: @Id
@id.description: The unique identifier for the property value. For example, this can be an ORCID identifier for a person who created a creative work.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Specifies that the type of the structured data object is a PropertyValue.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the property that is related to a specific creative work. For example, DOI of a person who created the creatiev work or the varibale name that is measured for a research work.

propertyID.title: Propertyid
propertyID.description: Specifies the property ID. For example, this can be the ORCID registry identifier.

value.title: Value
value.description: Represents the actual value assigned to the property. For example,  the ORCID identifier: 0000-0000-0000-0001.

url.title: Url
url.description: Indicates the URL associated with the property value. For example, the ORCID profile URL

creator.title: Creator
creator.description: Person or organization that created the work.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Describe the author(s) of a creative work

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of individual who contributed to this creative work. Contribution can include being an author, editor, publisher, etc.

email.title: Email
email.description: The email address of the individual who is listed as a contributor.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The unique identifier for the person.

@id.title: @Id
@id.description: The unique identifier for the property value. For example, this can be an ORCID identifier for a person who created a creative work.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Specifies that the type of the structured data object is a PropertyValue.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: All records in the IGUIDE data catalog are considered creative works. Creative works can encompass various forms of content, such as datasets, software source code, digital documents, etc.

name.title: Name
name.description: Record's title

url.title: Url
url.description: TODO

inLanguage.title: Inlanguage
inLanguage.description: The language of the content of the record.

creativeWorkStatus.title: Creativeworkstatus
creativeWorkStatus.description: The status of a creative work in terms of its stage in a lifecycle. Example terms include Incomplete, Draft, Published, Obsolete. Some organizations define a set of terms for the stages of their publication lifecycle.

dateModified.description: The date on which the CreativeWork was most recently modified or updated.

funding.title: Funding
funding.description: A Grant that directly or indirectly provide funding or sponsorship for creation of the dataset.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the property that is related to a specific creative work. For example, DOI of a person who created the creatiev work or the varibale name that is measured for a research work.

propertyID.title: Propertyid
propertyID.description: Specifies the property ID. For example, this can be the ORCID registry identifier.

address.title: Address

temporalCoverage.title: Temporalcoverage
temporalCoverage.description: The temporalCoverage of a CreativeWork indicates the period that the content applies to, i.e. that it describes, either as a DateTime or as a textual string indicating a time period in ISO 8601 time interval format.

spatialCoverage.title: Spatialcoverage
spatialCoverage.description: The spatialCoverage of a CreativeWork indicates the place(s) which are the focus of the content. It is a subproperty of contentLocation intended primarily for more technical and detailed materials. For example with a Dataset, it indicates areas that the dataset describes: a dataset of New York weather would have spatialCoverage which was the place: the state of New York.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the property that is related to a specific creative work. For example, DOI of a person who created the creatiev work or the varibale name that is measured for a research work.

propertyID.title: Propertyid
propertyID.description: Specifies the property ID. For example, this can be the ORCID registry identifier.

value.title: Value
value.description: Represents the actual value assigned to the property. For example,  the ORCID identifier: 0000-0000-0000-0001.

url.title: Url
url.description: Indicates the URL associated with the property value. For example, the ORCID profile URL

address.title: Address
address.description: The mailing address for the organization.

@id.title: @Id
@id.description: The unique identifier for the property value. For example, this can be an ORCID identifier for a person who created a creative work.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Specifies that the type of the structured data object is a PropertyValue.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the property that is related to a specific creative work. For example, DOI of a person who created the creatiev work or the varibale name that is measured for a research work.

@type.title: @Type
@type.description: Describe the author(s) of a creative work

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of individual who contributed to this creative work. Contribution can include being an author, editor, publisher, etc.

email.title: Email
email.description: The email address of the individual who is listed as a contributor.

identifier.title: Identifier
identifier.description: The unique identifier for the person.

@id.title: @Id
@id.description: The unique identifier for the property value. For example, this can be an ORCID identifier for a person who created a creative work.
